verses.roman:
āilena ācārya-gosāñi more kṛpā kari'
prema-ṛṇe baddha āmi, śudhite nā pāri

synonyms: āilena—has come; ācārya-gosāñi—Advaita Ācārya; more—to Me; kṛpā kari'-giving mercy; prema—of love; ṛṇe—by the debt; baddha āmi—I am bound; śudhite—to pay back; nā pāri—I am unable.
translation: "Out of His causeless mercy upon Me, Advaita Ācārya has also come here. I am indebted to Him for His affectionate behavior. This debt is impossible for Me to liquidate.
